response.original_title: See Through the Hollowed Blue Hellebore
response.overview: Beautiful images of southeastern Alaskaâ€™s majestic natural landscape drip, flow and take root in the accompaniment of the complex phonetic sounds of the indigenous Tlingit language and a lush sonic collage of local fauna. This landscape grows ever greener each year as the glaciers, like the language, begin to recede.
response.title: See Through the Hollowed Blue Hellebore
